name: Mario and Peach
description:
Mario and peach is a game where you play as peach to collect coins and defeat enemies. 

move with arrow keys
jump with space button
use bomb with B - when turnip counter visible
Throw turnips with a - when turnip counter visible
restart level with r - when turnip counter visible
Avoid: Donkey Kong, Bat Fire, Fire, Turtle Shells, bomb explosions and electric balls
Goal: Collect coins and reach flagpole
